name: item_blink
description:
# Active: Blink
Teleport to a target point up to **1200** units away. 

Blink Dagger cannot be used for **3** seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

name: item_blades_of_attack
lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: item_broadsword
lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: item_chainmail
lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: item_claymore
lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: item_helm_of_iron_will
lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: item_javelin
description:
# Passive: Pierce
Grants each attack a **30%** chance to pierce through evasion and deal **70** bonus magical damage.
lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

name: item_mithril_hammer
lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: item_platemail
lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: item_quarterstaff
lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: item_quelling_blade
description:
# Active: Chop Tree
Destroy a target tree. 

Cast Range: **350**

# Passive: Quell
Increases attack damage against non-hero units by **12** for melee heroes, and **6** for ranged.
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

name: item_ring_of_protection
lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: item_gauntlets
lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: item_slippers
lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

name: item_mantle
lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: item_branches
description:
# Use: Plant Tree
Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for **20** seconds.

Range: **400**
lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

name: item_belt_of_strength
lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: item_boots_of_elves
lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: item_robe
lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: item_circlet
lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: item_ogre_axe
lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: item_blade_of_alacrity
lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: item_staff_of_wizardry
lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: item_ultimate_orb
lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: item_gloves
lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: item_lifesteal
description:
# Passive: Lifesteal
Heals the attacker for **15%** of attack damage dealt.
lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

name: item_ring_of_regen
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: item_sobi_mask
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: item_boots
description: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

name: item_gem
description:
# Passive: True Sight
Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within **900** range of its carrier. 

# Passive: Everlasting
Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

name: item_cloak
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

name: item_talisman_of_evasion
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: item_cheese
description:
# Use: Fondue
Instantly restores **2500** health and **1500** mana.
lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

name: item_magic_stick
description:
# Active: Energy Charge
Instantly restores **15** health and mana per charge stored.

 Max **10** charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within **1200** range uses an ability.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: item_magic_wand
description:
# Active: Energy Charge
Instantly restores **15** health and mana per charge stored. 

Max **20** charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within **1200** range uses an ability.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: item_ghost
description:
# Active: Ghost Form
You enter ghost form for **4** seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and **-40%** more vulnerable to magic damage.
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

name: item_clarity
description:
# Use: Replenish
Grants **6** mana regeneration to the target for **25** seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: **250**
lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

name: item_flask
description:
# Use: Salve
Grants **40** health regeneration to the target for **10** seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: **250**
lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

name: item_dust
description:
# Use: Reveal
Reveals and slows invisible heroes by **-20%** in a **1050** radius around the caster for **12** seconds.
lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

name: item_bottle
description:
# Active: Regenerate
Consumes a charge to restore **115** health and **65** mana over **2.5** seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: **350**

# Passive:  Store Rune
Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.
lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

name: item_ward_observer
description:
# Use: Plant
Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a **1600** radius to your team. Lasts **6** minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Range: **500**
lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

name: item_ward_sentry
description:
# Use: Plant
Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a **900** radius.
Lasts **8** minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

Range: **500**
lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

name: item_tango
description:
# Use: Devour
Consumes a target tree to gain **7** health regeneration for **16** seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with **3** charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: **165**
lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

name: item_courier
description:
# Use: Deploy Courier
Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

name: item_tpscroll
description:
# Use: Teleport
After channeling for **3** seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. 

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
lore: What a hero truly needs.

json_data.AbilityBehavior: DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NOASSIST | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_RESUME_ATTACK | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_ROOT_DISABLES

name: item_travel_boots
description:
# Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll
Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. 
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

name: item_phase_boots
description:
# Active: Phase
Gives **20%** increased movement speed on melee heroes, and **10%** on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for **3** seconds.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

name: item_demon_edge
lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: item_eagle
lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: item_reaver
lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: item_relic
lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

name: item_hyperstone
lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: item_ring_of_health
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

name: item_void_stone
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: item_mystic_staff
lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: item_energy_booster
lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: item_point_booster
lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: item_vitality_booster
lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: item_power_treads
description:
# Active: Switch Attribute
Switches between +**10** Strength, +**10** Agility, or +**10** Intelligence.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

name: item_hand_of_midas
description:
# Active: Transmute
Kills a non-hero target for **160** gold and **2.1**x experience. 

 Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: **600**
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

name: item_oblivion_staff
lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary staff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

name: item_pers
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

name: item_poor_mans_shield
description:
# Passive: Damage Block
Gives a 100% chance to block **30** damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and **20** damage on ranged.

Has a **50%** chance to block damage from creeps.
lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

name: item_bracer
lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

name: item_wraith_band
lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

name: item_null_talisman
lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

name: item_mekansm
description:
# Active: Restore
Heals **275** health to allied units in a **1200** radius.

# Passive: Mekansm Aura
Grants **2.5** health regeneration to allied units in a **1200** radius.
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

name: item_vladmir
description:
# Passive: Vladmir's Aura
Grants **15%** lifesteal, **18%** bonus damage, **1.75** mana regeneration, and **3** armor to nearby allies. 

Radius: **1200**
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

name: item_buckler
description:
# Passive: Buckler Aura
Grants **2** armor to allied player units.

Radius: **1200**
lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

name: item_ring_of_basilius
description:
# Passive: Basilius Aura
Grants **1** mana regeneration to allies.  

Radius: **1200**
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

name: item_pipe
description:
# Active: Barrier
Gives a shield that blocks **400** magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts **12** seconds.

Radius: **1200**

# Passive: Insight Aura
Gives allied units **2.5** health regeneration and **10%** magic resistance.

Radius: **1200**
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

name: item_urn_of_shadows
description:
# Active: Soul Release
Provides **30** health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals **25** damage per second when cast on enemies. 

Lasts **8** seconds.  

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within **1400** units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: **950**
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

name: item_headdress
description:
# Passive: Regeneration Aura
Grants **2** health regeneration to allies.

Radius: **1200**
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

name: item_sheepstick
description:
# Active: Hex
Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for **3.5** seconds. The target has a base movement speed of **140** and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: **800**
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

name: item_orchid
description:
# Active: Soul Burn
Silences the target unit for **5** seconds. At the end of the silence, **30%** of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: **900**
lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

name: item_cyclone
description:
# Active: Cyclone
Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for **2.5** seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take **50** magical damage upon landing.

Range: **550**
Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel**
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

name: item_force_staff
description:
# Active: Force
Pushes any target unit **600** units in the direction it is facing.

Range: **550**
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

name: item_dagon
description:
# Active: Energy Burst
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: **400**/500/600/700/800
Range: **700**/750/800/850/900
Mana Cost: **120**/140/160/180/200
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_ultimate_scepter
description:
# Passive: Ability Upgrade
Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: item_refresher
description:
# Active: Reset Cooldowns
Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

name: item_assault
description:
# Passive: Assault Aura
Grants **30** attack speed and **5** armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by **-5**.

Radius: **1200**
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

name: item_heart
lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

name: item_black_king_bar
description:
# Active: Avatar
Grants Spell Immunity.  Duration decreases with each use. 

Duration: **9**/**8**/**7**/**6** 
Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel**
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

name: item_aegis
description:
# Passive: Reincarnation
Brings you to life with full health and mana **5** seconds after you die, at the location where you died. 

Reincarnation must be used within **5** minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

name: item_shivas_guard
description:
# Active: Arctic Blast
Emits a freezing wave that deals **200** magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by **-40%** for **4** seconds.

Radius: **900**

# Passive: Freezing Aura
Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by **-45** and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by **25%**. 

Radius: **1200**
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

name: item_bloodstone
description:
# Active: Bloodpact
Converts **30%** of your max mana to health regeneration over **2** seconds.

# Passive: Mana Battery
Each charge provides **0.2** MP regen and **0.35%** Spell Amp. Nearby kills provide **1** charges. Dying causes you to lose **3** charges. Starts with **14** charges.
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

name: item_sphere
description:
# Passive: Spellblock
Blocks most targeted spells once every **12** seconds.

# Active: Transfer Spellblock
Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for **12** seconds.

Range: **700**
lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

name: item_vanguard
description:
# Passive: Damage Block
Grants a **60%** chance to block **70** damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and **35** damage on ranged.
lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

name: item_blade_mail
description:
# Active: Damage Return
For **4.5** seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by **80%**.

# Passive: Damage Return
Everytime you are attacked, you return **20** damage plus **20%** of the attack damage dealt to you.
lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

name: item_soul_booster
lore: Regain lost courage.

name: item_hood_of_defiance
description:
# Active: Barrier
Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to **325** magical damage.  Lasts **12** seconds.
lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

name: item_rapier
description:
# Passive: Everlasting
Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. 

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

name: item_monkey_king_bar
description:
# Passive: Pierce
Grants each attack a **80%** chance to pierce through evasion and deal **70** bonus magical damage.
lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

name: item_radiance
description:
# Toggle: Burn
When active, scorches enemies for **60** magical damage per second, and causes them to miss **17%** of their attacks. Illusions deal **35** magical damage per second.

Radius: **700**
lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

name: item_butterfly
lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

name: item_greater_crit
description:
# Passive: Critical Strike
Grants each attack a **30%** chance to deal **225%** damage.
lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

name: item_basher
description:
# Passive: Bash
Grants melee heroes a **25%** chance on hit to stun the target for **1.5** seconds and deal **100** bonus physical damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is **10%**.
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

name: item_bfury
description:
# Active: Chop Tree
Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: **350**

# Passive: Quell
Increases attack damage against non-hero units by **18** for melee heroes, and **6** for ranged. 

# Passive: Cleave
Deals **70%** of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to **650** around the target. Deals **40%** against creeps. (Melee Only)
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

name: item_manta
description:
# Active: Mirror Image
Creates **2** images of your hero that last **20** seconds. 

Melee images deal **33%** damage, while Ranged images deal **28%**. Illusions take %tooltip_damage_incoming_melee_total_pct% damage 

Cooldown increased by %tooltip_ranged_cooldown_increase% seconds on ranged heroes.

Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel**
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

name: item_lesser_crit
description:
# Passive: Critical Strike
Grants each attack a **30%** chance to deal **160%** damage.
lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

name: item_armlet
description:
# Toggle: Unholy Strength
When active, Unholy Strength grants +**35** damage, +**25** strength and +**4** armor, but drains **40** health per second.

 You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

name: item_invis_sword
description:
# Active: Shadow Walk
Makes you invisible for **14** seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move **20%** faster and can move through units.  

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain **175** bonus physical damage on that attack.
lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

name: item_sange_and_yasha
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

ability_special.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

name: item_satanic
description:
# Active: Unholy Rage
Increases Lifesteal percentage to **200%** for **6** seconds. 

Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel** 

# Passive: Lifesteal
Heals the attacker for **25%** of attack damage dealt.
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

name: item_mjollnir
description:
# Active: Static Charge
Places a charged shield on a target unit for **15** seconds which has a **20%** chance to release a **225** magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and **4** additional enemies.

Range: **800**

# Passive: Chain Lightning
Grants a **30%** chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between **12** targets within a **650** radius, dealing **180** magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

name: item_skadi
description:
# Passive: Cold Attack
Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by **40%** for **3** seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by **-50%** movement speed and by **-50** attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by **-25%** movement speed and by **-25** attack speed.
lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

name: item_sange
lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

ability_special.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

name: item_helm_of_the_dominator
description:
# Active: Dominate
Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to **380** and max health to a minimum of **1000**. Also provides the unit with +**25** base attack damage, +**12** health regen, +**4** mana regen and +**4** armor. 

Dominated units with a max health of greater than **1000** retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to **100** gold.

Range: **700**
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

name: item_maelstrom
description:
# Passive: Chain Lightning
Grants a **30%** chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between **4** targets within a **650** radius, dealing **140** magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

name: item_desolator
description:
# Passive: Corruption
Your attacks reduce the target's armor by **-6** for **7** seconds.
lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

name: item_yasha
lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

name: item_mask_of_madness
description:
# Active: Berserk
Gives **110** attack speed and **30** movement speed, but reduces your armor by **8** and silences you.  Lasts **6** seconds.

# Passive: Lifesteal
Heals the attacker for **20%** of attack damage dealt.
lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

name: item_diffusal_blade
description:
# Active: Inhibit
Targets an enemy, slowing it for **4** seconds.

Range: **600**

# Passive: Manabreak
Each attack burns **40** mana from the target, and deals **1** physical damage per burned mana. 

Burns **12** mana per attack from melee illusions and **8** mana per attack from ranged illusions.
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

name: item_ethereal_blade
description:
# Active: Ether Blast
Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and **-40%** more vulnerable to magic damage.  Lasts for **4** seconds on allies and **4** seconds on enemies.

  Enemy targets are also slowed by **-80%**, and take **1.5**x your primary attribute + **125** as magical damage.

Range: **800**
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

name: item_soul_ring
description:
# Active: Sacrifice
Consume **170** health to temporarily gain **150** mana.  Lasts **10** seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

name: item_arcane_boots
description:
# Active: Replenish Mana
Restores **160** mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: **1200**
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

name: item_orb_of_venom
description:
# Passive: Poison Attack
Poisons the target, dealing **2** magical damage per second and slowing movement by **-13%** if the equipped hero is melee, or by **-4%** if they are ranged. Lasts for **2** seconds.
lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

name: item_ancient_janggo
description:
# Active: Endurance
Consumes a charge and gives +**45** attack speed and +**13%** movement speed to nearby allies for **6** seconds. 

Comes with **8** charges.

Radius: **1200**  


# Passive: Swiftness Aura
Grants **20** movement speed to allies.  

Radius: **1200**
lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

name: item_medallion_of_courage
description:
# Active: Valor
If cast on an ally, grants them the **5** armor, and removing it from the caster. 

If cast on an enemy, reduces **5** armor on both the enemy and the caster. 

Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: **1000**
lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

name: item_smoke_of_deceit
description:
# Use: Disguise
Turns the caster and all allied player-controlled units in a **1200** radius invisible, and grants **15%** bonus movement speed for **35** seconds. 

Attacking, or moving within **1025** range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility. 

Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

name: item_veil_of_discord
description:
# Active: Magic Weakness
Cast a **600** radius blast that causes enemy heroes to take **18%** increased damage from spells.

Range: **1200**
Duration: **16** seconds. 


# Passive: Basilius Aura
Grants **1.75** mana regeneration to allies.  

Radius: **1200**
lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

name: item_dagon_2
description:
# Active: Energy Burst
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: 400/**500**/600/700/800
Range: 700/**750**/800/850/900
Mana Cost: 120/**140**/160/180/200
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_dagon_3
description:
# Active: Energy Burst
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: 400/500/**600**/700/800
Range: 700/750/**800**/850/900
Mana Cost: 120/140/**160**/180/200
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_dagon_4
description:
# Active: Energy Burst
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: 400/500/600/**700**/800
Range: 700/750/800/**850**/900
Mana Cost: 120/140/160/**180**/200
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_dagon_5
description:
# Active: Energy Burst
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

Damage: 400/500/600/700/**800**
Range: 700/750/800/850/**900**
Mana Cost: 120/140/160/180/**200**
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_rod_of_atos
description:
# Active: Cripple
Roots the target for **2** seconds.

Range: **1100**
lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

name: item_abyssal_blade
description:
# Active: Overwhelm
Stuns a target enemy unit for **2** seconds. 

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: **150**

# Passive: Bash
Grants melee heroes a **25%** chance on hit to stun the target for **1.5** seconds and deal **100** bonus physical damage.  Bash chance for ranged heroes is **10%**.

# Passive: Damage Block
Grants a **60%** chance to block **70** damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and **35** damage on ranged.
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

name: item_heavens_halberd
description:
# Active: Disarm
Prevents a target from attacking for **3** seconds on melee targets, and **5** seconds on ranged targets.

Range: **600**
lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

ability_special.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

name: item_ring_of_aquila
description:
# Passive: Aquila Aura
Grants **1.25** mana regeneration and **2** armor to nearby allies.

Radius: **1200**

# Toggle: Aura
Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

name: item_tranquil_boots
description:
# Passive: Break
Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus **14** HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to **40** for **13** seconds.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

name: item_shadow_amulet
description:
# Active: Fade
Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.  

Has a **1.25** second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving. 

There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

Range: **600**
lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

name: item_enchanted_mango
description:
# Use: Eat Mango
Instantly restores **100** mana.

Range: **400**
lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

name: item_ward_dispenser
description:
# Use: Plant
Plant the currently active ward.  Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

Range: **500**
lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

name: item_travel_boots_2
description:
# Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll
Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. 
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

name: item_meteor_hammer
description:
# Active: Meteor Hammer
CHANNELED - After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a **315** AoE, stunning enemies for **1.5** seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for **6** seconds.

Building Impact Damage: **75** 
Building Over Time Damage: **60** 

Non-Building Impact Damage: **150** 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: **90** 

Channel Duration: **2.5** seconds.
Landing Time: **.5** seconds.

name: item_nullifier
description:
# Active: Nullify
Dispels the target and applies a debuff for **5** seconds. Continuously dispels the target. Anytime the target is attacked, it will be slowed by **80%** for **0.5** seconds.

Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel**

name: item_lotus_orb
description:
# Active: Echo Shell
Applies a shield to the target unit for **6** seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. 

Range: **900**
Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel**
lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

name: item_solar_crest
description:
# Active: Shine
When cast on an ally, grants them **6** armor, **65** attack speed, and **10%** movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes **6** armor, **65** attack speed, and **10%** movement speed.

Removes the armor from the caster when used. 

 Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: **1000**
lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

name: item_guardian_greaves
description:
# Active: Mend
Restores **300** health and **200** mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: **1200**
Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel**

# Passive: Guardian Aura
Grants **2.5** health regeneration and **3** armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below **20%**, they receive **16** health regeneration and **10** armor. 

Radius: **1200** 
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

name: item_aether_lens
description:
# Passive: Aethereal Focus
Increases targeted spell and item cast range by **225**.
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

name: item_octarine_core
description:
# Passive: Cooldown Reduction
Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by **25%**.
lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

name: item_dragon_lance
description:
# Passive: Dragon's Reach
Increases attack range of ranged heroes by **140**.
lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

name: item_faerie_fire
description:
# Use: Imbue
Instantly restores **85** health.
lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

name: item_iron_talon
description:
# Active: Chop
Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove **40%** of its current HP.

If cast on a tree, instantly destroys it.

Unit Range: **350**
Tree Range: **350**
lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

name: item_blight_stone
description:
# Passive: Lesser Corruption
Your attacks reduce the target's armor by **-2** for **8** seconds.
lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

name: item_tango_single
description:
# Use: Devour
Consumes a target tree to gain **7** health regeneration for **16** seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Tree Range: **165**
lore: Om nom nom.

name: item_crimson_guard
description:
# Active: Guard
For **12** seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a **100%** chance to block **70** damage from each incoming attack.

Units may only be affected by Guard once every **40** seconds.

Radius: **1200**

# Passive: Damage Block
Grants a **60%** chance to block **70** damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and **35** damage on ranged.
lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

name: item_wind_lace
description: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.

name: item_moon_shard
description:
# Use: Consume
Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain **60** attack speed and **200** bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

# Passive: Shade Sight
Grants **400** bonus night vision.
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

name: item_silver_edge
description:
# Active: Shadow Walk
Makes you invisible for **14** seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While invisible, you move **25%** faster and can move through units.  

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal **175** bonus physical damage to the target, and disable their passive abilities for **4** seconds.
lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

name: item_bloodthorn
description:
# Active: Soul Rend
Silences a target for **5** seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional **30%** of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and **100%** chance to crit for **130%** damage.

Range: **900**
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

name: item_echo_sabre
description:
# Passive: Echo Strike
Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a **100%** movement slow for **0.8** seconds on each strike.
lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

name: item_glimmer_cape
description:
# Active: Glimmer
After a **0.6** second delay, grants invisibility and **45%** magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for **5** seconds.

Range: **550**

Can be cast while channelling.
lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

name: item_aeon_disk
description:
# Passive: Combo Breaker
When you take damage and your health falls below **70%**, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a **2.5** second buff that provides +**75%** Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage.

name: item_tome_of_knowledge
description:
# Use: Enlighten
Grants you **700** experience plus **135** per tome consumed by your team after the first two.

Tomes Used By Team: **0**
lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

name: item_refresher_shard
description:
# Use: Reset Cooldowns
Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

name: item_crown
lore: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.

name: item_hurricane_pike
description:
# Active: Hurricane Thrust
Pushes you and target enemy **450** units away from each other, and for **5** seconds, allows you to make **4** attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +**100** attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: **550**
Enemy Range: **400**

# Passive:  Dragon's Reach
Increases attack range of ranged heroes by **140**.
lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

name: item_infused_raindrop
description:
# Passive: Magical Damage Block
Consumes a charge to block **120** magic damage from damage instances over **75** damage. 

Comes with **6** charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

name: item_spirit_vessel
description:
# Active: Soul Release
When used against enemies, it reduces health by **4%** of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration, healing, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by **45%**. Deals **35** damage per second. 

When used on allies, it provides **40** health regeneration per second. 

Lasts **8** seconds.  

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within **1400** units.  Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: **950**

name: item_holy_locket
description:
# Active: Energy Charge
Target an allied unit to instantly restore **15** health and mana per charge stored. 

Max **20** charges. Automatically gains a charge every **10** seconds and whenever a visible enemy within **1200** range uses an ability.


# Passive: Holy Blessing
Amplifies heals you provide by **35%**.


# Passive: Regeneration Aura
Grants **3** health regeneration to allies.

Radius: **1200**
lore: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.

name: item_ultimate_scepter_2
description:
# Passive: Ability Upgrade
Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: item_kaya_and_sange
lore: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.

ability_special.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

name: item_yasha_and_kaya
lore: Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.

name: item_flying_courier
description:
# Use: Upgrade Courier
Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base. 

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.
lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

name: item_keen_optic
lore: Stolen from a tinker's shop ages ago, this handy lens has seen service to many owners.

name: item_grove_bow
description:
# Passive: Magic Amp
Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by **15%**.
lore: A gift from the moon goddess to one of her prized disciples many memories ago.

name: item_quickening_charm
description:
# Passive: Cooldown Reduction
Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by **12%**
lore: An evergreen amulet of druidic origins.

name: item_philosophers_stone
lore: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.

name: item_force_boots
description:
# Active: Force
Dispels the user and pushes them **750** units in the direction they are facing.

# Passive: Speed Unlock
Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer 
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Elusive marvels never successfully studied for proper classification in the archives.

name: item_desolator_2
description:
# Passive: Greater Corruption
Your attacks reduce the target's armor by **-10** for **7** seconds.
lore: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.

name: item_phoenix_ash
description:
# Passive: Rebirth
Lethal damage is prevented and instead the wearer is healed to half health and non-ultimate ability cooldowns reset. Gets consumed on trigger.

name: item_seer_stone
description:
# Active: Reveal
Reveal a target **800** area of the map for **6** seconds.
lore: The curious creation of a wizard who professed to hail from another time.

name: item_greater_mango
description:
# Consume Unbelievably Good Mango
Overwhelms your hero, causing you to die. However, when you respawn, you will have all talents on both sides skilled.

name: item_craggy_coat
description: Increases the wearer's armor, while reducing their attack speed.

name: item_greater_faerie_fire
description:
# Use: Imbue
Instantly restores **250** health.

name: item_timeless_relic
description: Increases all outgoing spell damage and debuff duration.
lore: An unmarred discovery from the excavated ruins of an ancient wizard's academy.

name: item_mirror_shield
description:
# Passive: Echo Shield
Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every **8** seconds.
lore: The shield that long ago robbed the old one of his first memories.

name: item_elixer
description:
# Use: Consume
Restores **500** health and **250** mana to the target over **6** seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: **250**

name: item_ironwood_tree
description:
# Use: Plant Tree
Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for **20** seconds.

Range: **800**
lore: Precious. And hearty as a weed.

name: item_royal_jelly
description:
# Use: Consume
Grants a target allied unit a permanent buff that provides +**2.25** Health Regen and +**1.25** Mana Regen.

Does not stack on the same unit.
lore: To those who harvest olgru jelly, success serves more than mere profit--it's often the means to survival--for only the jelly itself can cure the ravages that follow a sting from the vigilant denizens of the giant hives.

name: item_pupils_gift
description: Increases both non-primary attributes.
lore: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.

name: item_tome_of_aghanim
description:
# Use: Consume
Temporarily grants an allied target the Aghanim's Scepter buff for **3** minutes.

name: item_repair_kit
description:
# Use: Building Repair
Targets a building, restoring **40%** of it's health over **30** seconds. Also grants +**10** armor during this period.

 Range: **600**

name: item_mind_breaker
description:
# Passive: Silence Strike
The next attack silences the hit enemy for **1.75** seconds.
lore: A bewitching blade of indeterminate form capable of piercing the psyche of even the most willful foe.

name: item_third_eye
description:
# Passive: True Sight
Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within **500** range of its carrier. 

# Passive: Charge Loss
Loses a charge on death. After all charges are lost, the item disappears.

name: item_spell_prism
description:
# Passive: Cooldown Reduction
Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by **18%**.
lore: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.

name: item_horizon
description:
# Active: Blink Strike
Targets a unit to teleport to them. Knocks enemies back **250** distance and disables them for **1** second. 

Range: **1600**

name: item_fusion_rune
description:
# Use: Consume
Grants the target the bonuses of every Power Rune for **50** seconds. Each use consumes a charge.

name: item_princes_knife
description:
# Passive: Hex Strike
The next attack hexes the hit enemy into a frog for **1.5** seconds.

name: item_spider_legs
description:
# Active: Scurry
Grants you **22%** bonus movement speed and free pathing for **3** seconds. Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: A horrifying yet useful mixture of necromancy and artificing.

name: item_helm_of_the_undying
description:
# Passive: Death Delay
Survive for an extra **5** seconds after receiving a killing blow.

name: item_mango_tree
description:
# Use: Plant a Mango Tree
Targets the ground to plant a mango tree that provides unlimited mango power. The tree generates Enchanted Mangoes every **60** seconds, and provides unobstructed vision in the area 

Range: **200**

name: item_witless_shako
description: Increases the wearer's max health, while reducing their max mana.

name: item_vambrace
description:
Also provides one of the following, based on the Vambrace's main attribute:
 Strength: +**10%** Magic Resistance 
 Agility: +**10** Attack Speed 
 Intelligence: +**6%** Spell Amp
lore: The coveted treasure that divided the heirs of Queen Raiya upon her death, resulting in the eventual downfall of her kingdom.

name: item_imp_claw
description:
# Passive: Critical Strike
Empowers your next attack, causing it to be a critical strike dealing **130%** damage.
lore: Though their tasks are largely thankless, demon hunters can often turn a profit bartering parts in Weeping Rose.

name: item_flicker
description:
# Active: Flicker
Dispells debuffs and blinks you in a random forward direction for a random distance between **200** and **600**. Does not get disabled on incoming damage.
lore: The technically-true-to-his-word 'teleportation device' crafted by a notorious fae trickster.

name: item_spy_gadget
description:
# Passive: Prescient Aura
Lowers Scan cooldown by **50%** . Increases attack and cast range of allies in a **1200** unit radius.
lore: A handy tool that manages to make close what once was far.

name: item_arcane_ring
description:
# Active: Replenish Mana
Restores **75** mana to all nearby allies. 

 Radius: **1200**
lore: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.

name: item_ocean_heart
description:
# Passive: Water Regen
Provides you with **10** HP regen and **5** mana regen while in the river.
lore: A charm blessed by the Council of the Brine.

name: item_broom_handle
lore: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.

name: item_trusty_shovel
description:
# Active: Dig
Channel for **1** second. 
Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, an Enchanted Mango, or an enemy Kobold.
lore: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.

name: item_nether_shawl
lore: An otherworldly garment tethered to our plane by unknown means.

name: item_dragon_scale
description:
# Passive: Afterburn
Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing **18** damage per second for **3** seconds. Affects buildings.
lore: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.

name: item_essence_ring
description:
# Active: Life Essence
Increases your current and max health by **400** for **15** seconds.
lore: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.

name: item_clumsy_net
description:
# Active: Ensnare
Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for **1.75** seconds.

 Range: **600**

name: item_enchanted_quiver
description:
# Passive: Certain Strike
Empowers your next attack with **300** bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +**400** bonus range for the attack.
lore: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.

name: item_ninja_gear
description:
# Active: Solitary Disguise
Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only.
lore: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.

name: item_illusionsts_cape
description:
# Active: Create Illusion
Creates an image under your control. 

# Passive: Illusion Mastery
Increases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by **6%**.
lore: A dashing cape whose creator insists on calling 'Cloak of Apparition' as opposed to his assistant's 'Illusion' drivel.

name: item_havoc_hammer
description:
# Active: Havoc
Knocks back enemies in **400** range around you, slowing them by **50%** for **3** seconds and dealing **175** + **1**x your str as magical damage.

name: item_panic_button
description:
# Passive: Rejuvenate 
When the wearer's health falls below **20%**, they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for **300** health.

name: item_apex
lore: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.

name: item_ballista
description:
# Passive: Knockback
Knocks back enemies **50** distance and deals **50** pure damage with every attack.
lore: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.

name: item_woodland_striders
description:
# Active: Woodland Stride
Create a path of trees behind you for **3** seconds. Trees last up to **15** seconds. 

# Passive: Tree Walking
Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees.
 
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: item_trident
description: Combines Sange, Yasha and Kaya together.

ability_special.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

name: item_demonicon
description:
# Active: Greater Demonic Summoning
Summon 2 sets of Level 3 Necronomicon Units that last **75** seconds. Units have 100% more health and 75% more damage.
lore: A record of the final reckoning. With one page torn out.

name: item_fallen_sky
description:
# Active: Fallen Sky
Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after **.5** seconds in a **315** AoE, stunning enemies for **2** seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every **1** seconds to enemy units and buildings for **6** seconds.

Building Impact Damage: **75** 
Building Over Time Damage: **50** 

Non-Building Impact Damage: **150** 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: **90**

 Range: **1600**
lore: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.

name: item_pirate_hat
description:
# Active: Dig
Channel for **1** second. 
Always finds a Bounty Rune!
lore: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.

name: item_dimensional_doorway
description:
# Active
Teleport instantly anywhere on the map.

name: item_ex_machina
description:
# Active: Reset Cooldowns
Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).
lore: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.

name: item_faded_broach
lore: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.

name: item_paladin_sword
description:
# Passive: Greater Healing
Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by **14%**.
lore: The sigil blade of the legendary Brother Yhols of Gausra, stripped from its scabbard on the day of his controversial excommunication.

name: item_minotaur_horn
description:
# Active: Lesser Avatar
Grants Spell Immunity for **2** seconds.
lore: The trophy from a mighty beast ambushed and slain in the recesses of its own home.

name: item_orb_of_destruction
description:
# Passive: Impeding Corruption
Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.
lore: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.

name: item_the_leveller
lore: A demonic blade that struck the final blow to crack the gates of the Sanctum of Solanas.

name: item_titan_sliver
lore: Though many desire this brilliant shard for its obvious qualities, a school of study exists to determine the true size and purpose of its incomprehensible whole.

name: item_voodoo_mask
description:
# Passive: Spell Lifesteal
**10%** of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.  

Lifesteal reduced to **2%** against creeps.
lore: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

name: item_blitz_knuckles
lore: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.

name: item_witch_blade
description:
# Passive: Witch Blade
Causes your next attack to apply a poison for **3** seconds, slowing by **25%** and dealing **1**x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.
lore: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.

name: item_chipped_vest
description:
# Passive
Everytime you are attacked, you return **30** damage to heroes and **20** damage to creeps.
lore: It doesn't look like much, but it's oddly comfy.

name: item_wizard_glass
description:
# Active
Deals **125** damage to up to **2** random enemy units within **700**.

name: item_orb_of_corrosion
description:
# Passive: Corrosion
Dealing **3** damage per second, reducing armor by **3**, and slowing movement by **13%** if the equipped hero is melee, or by **4%** if they are ranged.

Lasts for **3** seconds.
lore: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.

name: item_gloves_of_travel
description: Reduces TP cooldown by **20** seconds and causes TP scrolls to not be consumed.

name: item_trickster_cloak
description:
# Active: Cloak
Causes you to become invisible for **6** seconds.
lore: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.

name: item_elven_tunic
lore: Even simple items of elven make seem imbued with inexplicable efficacy.

name: item_cloak_of_flames
description:
# Passive
Burns enemy units for **45** damage per second. Illusions deal **30** damage per second.

Radius: **375**
lore: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.

name: item_gladiator_helm
description: Upon taking hero damage, you gains **18** damage, **5** armor, **15** for **7** seconds.

name: item_possessed_mask
description:
# Passive: Lifesteal
Heals the attacker for **7%** of attack damage dealt.
lore: Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.

name: item_oakheart
description:
# Active: Rejuvenate
Target an allied hero and restore **480** health over **12** seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

name: item_stormcrafter
description:
# Active
Cyclones your hero for **0.75** seconds. 


# Passive
Zaps an enemy within **700** range, dealing **200** damage and a **40%** slow for **0.3** seconds. Strikes every **3** seconds.
lore: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.

name: item_overflowing_elixir
description: Restores **500** health, and **200** mana over **4** seconds. Can capture runes.

name: item_mysterious_hat
lore: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.

name: item_fluffy_hat
lore: Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.

name: item_falcon_blade
lore: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.

name: item_mage_slayer
description:
# Passive: Mage Slayer
Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do **35%** less spell damage for **4** seconds.
lore: Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.

name: item_overwhelming_blink
description:
# Active: Overwhelming Blink
Teleport to a target point up to **1200** units away.

After teleportation, all enemies in a **800** AoE have **50%** movement speed slow and **50** attack speed slow for **6** seconds, and take damage equal to 200 + **100%** of your strength. 

Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for **3** seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
lore: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.

name: item_swift_blink
description:
# Active: Swift Blink
Teleport to a target point up to **1200** units away.

After teleportation, you gain **40%** phased movement speed, +**50** Attack Speed, and +**50** Attack Damage for **6** seconds. 

Swift Blink cannot be used for **3** seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
lore: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.

name: item_arcane_blink
description:
# Active: Arcane Blink
Teleport to a target point up to **1200** units away.

After teleportation, you gain **25%** Ability Cooldown Reduction and **50%** Cast Point reduction for **6** seconds. 

Arcane Blink cannot be used for **3** seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
lore: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.

name: item_aghanims_shard
description:
# Passive: Ability Upgrade
Upgrades one of your abilities.
lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

name: item_wind_waker
description:
# Active: Cyclone
Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for **2.5** seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units.

Enemy units take **50** magical damage upon landing.

Range: **550**
Dispel Type: **Basic Dispel**
lore: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.

name: item_helm_of_the_dominator_2
description:
# Active: Dominate
Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to **380** and max health to a minimum of **1800**. Also provides the unit with +**25** base attack damage, +**12** health regen, +**4** mana regen and +**4** armor. 

Dominated units with a max health of greater than **1800** retain their original max health.  Dominated unit's bounty is set to **150** gold.

Range: **700**
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

name: item_star_mace
description:
# Passive: Cleave
Melee heroes deal **20%** of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to **650** around the target.

name: item_penta_edged_sword
description:
# Passive: Maim
Each attack has a **25%** chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by **20%** and attack speed by **60** for **3** seconds.
lore: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.

name: item_warhammer
description:
# Active: Warhammer
Deals **75** damage and reduces the target's armor by **3** for **6** seconds.

name: item_psychic_headband
description:
# Active: Psychic Push
Pushes the target enemy unit away from you **400** distance.
lore: A failed experiment in finer telekinetic control, still fit for other ends.

name: item_ceremonial_robe
description:
# Passive: Ceremonial Aura
Lowers enemy Status Resistance by **10%** and Magic Resistance by **10%**.

Radius: **1200**
lore: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.

name: item_book_of_shadows
description:
# Active: Shadows
Target an enemy, ally or self. Causes the target to become untargetable but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 3 seconds. Applies a Basic Dispel.
lore: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.

name: item_giants_ring
description:
# Passive: Giant's Foot
Can path over any terrain and deals **100%** of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.
lore: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.

name: item_vengeances_shadow
description:
# Passive: Vengeance's Shadow
Upon death, you spawn a strong-illusion that deals **100%** damage and takes **150%** damage. Can cast all basic spells. Illusion casts **30** seconds.

name: item_bullwhip
description:
# Active: Whip
Grants **18%** movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by **18%** when cast on enemies. Lasts **4** seconds.
lore: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.

name: item_quicksilver_amulet
description:
# Passive: Quicksilver
Grants you a bonus **4%** movement speed and **20** attack speed anytime one of your abilities are on cooldown.
lore: An enchanted talisman brimming with a mysterious substance.

name: item_eternal_shroud
description:
# Active: Shroud
Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to **400** magical damage, converting damage taken into mana.  Lasts **12** seconds.
lore: A pristine hood that feeds upon strife to empower its owner.

name: item_aghanims_shard_roshan
description:
# Passive: Ability Upgrade
Upgrades one of your abilities.
lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

name: item_ultimate_scepter_roshan
description:
# Passive: Ability Upgrade
Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: item_satchel
description: Increases XP that you earn by **15%**.

name: item_super_blink
description:
# Active: Blink
Teleport to a target point up to **1200** units away.
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

name: item_gungir
description:
# Active: Eternal Chains
Roots all enemies in a target **450** radius for **2** seconds and deals **220** damage.

Range: **1100** 


# Passive: Chain Lightning
Grants a **30%** chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between **4** targets within a **650** radius, dealing **160** magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.
lore: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.
